WorkItem.Description:
It appears that the Optimizer is not using items that are unavailable due to the "refine types of items listed" even if they are marked as available for optimizer.
 
Specific case:
Moonkin has both "Meteor Chaser's Rainments" and "Vestments of Spruce and Fir" selected as available.  Under Refine Types of Items listed, "Cloth" is de-selected.  Running the optimizer, it choose Vestments (leather) as best option for chest.  Selecting Gear Slot: Chest on the right pane shows the cloth (Meteor) as being better. 
 
Selecting cloth in the Refine Items and re-optimizing choose Meteor as a better chest.
WorkItem.Summary: [Optimizer] Item Marking should override Refine Item Types Listed

Comments.Message: I expected that "Refine Types of Items Listed" was only for display purposes and would not affect the outcome of the optimizer when am item was selected.
No, that's not how it works, or is intended to work.
